item.title: Don’t let your role define you
item.description: This article started off life as an essay on my career life, now it’s some core tips that helped me.

item.description: Exploring the idea of designing through code.

item.description: Learning Typescript, the Figma API and solving a real personal problem.

item.description: I decided to put together a free, multi-device, minimal wallpaper of Ram's ten principles.

item.description: What learning Vue has taught me about the future of design, development and the modern web.

item.title: Getting to yes

item.title: Why ‘users’ are humans
item.description: Design is about people, and I've been thinking a lot about the problem of the term 'user'.
